name: Loop Frogs
description:
Loop Frogs is a puzzle platformer where your two frogs must work together to reach the exit. Green can loop through the same actions again and again, and Brown can use this to clear the way, reach higher platforms and get to the exit.

Built in Phaser 3 in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 47 game jam: 'Stuck in a Loop'

Controls
  • 2-button gamepad support
  • Keyboard:
    • AD / cursors - Move
    • , or SPACE - Jump
    • . or ENTER - Switch
  • Alternative layout:
    • QD (azerty)
    • AE (dvorak)
